summary: Add `upsertMemo` command to the TypeScript Workflow API. The underlying support already exists in the Core SDK and just needs to be exposed.
userImpact: Users can update workflow memos directly from the TypeScript SDK without workarounds.
proposedFix: Expose the existing Core SDK upsertMemo support in the TypeScript Workflow API
resolutionDetails: Feature implemented and exposed in the Workflow API
keyQuote: Underlying support already exists in Core SDK.
